channel.title: Posts on Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Portfolio

item.title: Transit
item.description: Part 1: The Idea I was recently in a car with one of my best friends and his new wife1 (also a good friend of mine). We were making our way back from our parents joint 4th of July BBQ in Philadelphia towards Washington DC where we had all attended University. These two friends of mine were coming back down to prepare for their fast approaching move to NYC 2.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
